contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox City Japan |Name= Nishiki |JapaneseName= 錦町 |settlement_type= Town |MapImage= Nishiki in Kumamoto Prefecture.png |Region= [[Kyūshū]] |Prefecture=[[Kumamoto Prefecture|Kumamoto]] |District= [[Kuma District, Kumamoto|Kuma]] |Area_km2= 84.87 |PopDate= 2003 |Population= 11,904 |Density_km2= auto |Coords= |LatitudeDegrees= 32 |LatitudeMinutes= 12 |LatitudeSeconds= |LongtitudeDegrees= 130 |LongtitudeMinutes= 50 |LongtitudeSeconds= |Tree= |Flower= |Bird= |SymbolImage= |SymbolDescription= |Mayor= |CityHallPostalCode= |CityHallAddress= |CityHallPhone= |CityHallLink= [http://www.nishiki-machi.com/ Town of Nishiki] }} {{nihongo|'''Nishiki'''|錦町|Nishiki-machi}} is a [[towns of Japan|town]] located in [[Kuma District, Kumamoto|Kuma District]], [[Kumamoto Prefecture|Kumamoto]], [[Japan]]. In 2003 the town had an estimated [[population]] of 11,904 and a [[population density|density]] of 140.26 persons per km². The total area is 84.87 km². ==External links== {{Commons category-inline}} *[http://www.nishiki-machi.com/ Nishiki official website] {{ja icon}} [[Category:Towns in Kumamoto Prefecture]] {{Kumamoto-geo-stub}}
